title: Ask an Australian about children
creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Kay Roberts
brief_description: Shows educational structure, welfare provisions and social services, both publicly and privately supported, and recreational youth activities in Australia. Also available in Greek, Italian, Serbo Croat, Spanish and Turkish languages.
